description: This file defines the ComcastPollControlCheckinEvent class, which represents a specific event in the Zigbee core mock device for Comcast's implementation. It extends ClusterCommandEvent and includes methods for constructing the event with device data, retrieving RSSI and LQI, and generating a command payload as a byte array.

classes.name: ComcastPollControlCheckinEvent
classes.description: Represents a poll control check-in event with data like battery voltage, temperature, RSSI, LQI, retries, and rejoins, used within the Zigbee mock environment for testing and simulation.

methods.name: ComcastPollControlCheckinEvent
methods.description: Constructor that initializes the event with device cluster data and various status metrics.

methods.name: getRssi
methods.description: Returns the RSSI value associated with the event.

methods.name: getLqi
methods.description: Returns the LQI value associated with the event.

methods.name: getCommandPayload
methods.description: Generates a byte array payload representing the event data, formatted for Zigbee command transmission.
